name: Spider Solitaire Classic!!
description:
Spider Solitaire by Flying Pan is the #1 classic spider solitaire you know and love for your iPhone, iPad, and iPod. If you like windows spider solitaire, you're going to LOVE this app!!

Each day you’ll receive a unique Daily Challenge. Solve the Daily Challenge and receive a crown for that day. Earn trophies each month by winning more crowns! Your Daily Challenges, crowns, and current trophy status are available to view any time. Play the current day’s deal and replay it as many times as you’d like on that day.

You can move cards with a single tap or drag them to their destination. You can either play the easy 1-suit games, or if you feel up-to the challenge, try your luck with 2-suit, 4-suit, or even Spiderette game modes.

=====FEATURES======
• Daily Challenges
• Winning Deals
• 1-Suit games (Easy)
• 2-Suit games (Medium)
• 4-Suit games (Hard)
• Standard spider solitaire rules and scoring
• Single tap to place a card or drag and drop
• Unlimited undos
• Smart hints show potentially useful moves
• Portrait or Landscape
• Left handed and Right handed option
• Interruption friendly with auto-save and resume
• Timer, moves, and statistics
• Fun and stunning winning animations
• Beautifully crafted and curated themes
• Universal app for iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch

If you've ever played solitaire (also known as Patience or Klondike) or any of its variants such as Tri Peaks, FreeCell, Spiderette, Blackjack, Video Poker and other poker card games, then you are going to love spider solitaire classic! Play spider solitaire classic for free today!!
